title: Systematic Sync Manifest
description: Provenance manifest tracking upstream sources for bundled definitions, including intelligent rewrite tracking for repeatable conversions

definitions.description: Bundled definitions mapped to their upstream provenance and conversion metadata

upstream_commit.description: Commit SHA at time of sync

notes.description: Human-readable summary of what was changed or adapted during import

upstream_content_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the upstream file content at time of sync, for detecting upstream changes

rewrites.description: Structured log of intelligent rewrites applied beyond mechanical conversion. Each entry records what was changed and why, enabling repeatable re-application on future syncs.

field.description: Frontmatter field or content section that was rewritten (e.g., 'description', 'body:tool-references', 'body:branding')

reason.description: Why this rewrite was needed (e.g., 'CC description lacks OC trigger conditions', 'branding reference to Claude Code')

original.description: Original value or snippet before rewrite (optional, for diffing)

manual_overrides.description: Fields or sections that have been manually customized by a human contributor. These MUST be preserved on future re-imports â€” the skill will skip rewriting these fields.
